itemLabel: Geoffrey Cross, Baron Cross of Chelsea

wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Geoffrey Neale Cross, Baron Cross of Chelsea, PC (1 December 1904 – 4 August 1989) was a British judge who served as a Lord of Appeal in Ordinary between 1971 and 1975.
